sentence.Network_en: The commander authorizing the hoisting of the flag should also promptly send a parlementaire or parlementaires.
sentence.Network_cn: 指挥官命令升起白旗后,需立即指派一位或多位的军事使者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: paragraph [法] 款；段parlementaire 军事谈判代表partnership 伙伴关系
parlement 大理院, parlementaire 军使, parlement 巴列门

list.abs: the conduct of war and the restoration of peace require certain nonhostile relations between belligerents . these relations are conducted through parlementaires , military passports , safe-conducts , safeguards , cartels , capitulations , and armistices.
讨论注解 en Français,... ... 清除注释 Effacer les annotations 冗长辩论 obstruction parlementaire 神创论 créationnisme.
parlementaires must be duly authorized in a writteninstrument signed by the commander of the forces .军事使者需有由指挥官所签发之书面证书。

the conduct of war and the restoration of peace require certain nonhostile relations between belligerents . these relations are conducted through parlementaires , military passports , safe-conducts , safeguards , cartels , capitulations , and armistices.
